metadata.name: Suspicious Where Execution
metadata.comment: Adversaries may enumerate browser bookmarks to learn more about compromised hosts. Browser bookmarks may reveal personal information about users (ex: banking sites, interests, social media, etc.) as well as details about internal network resources such as servers, tools/dashboards, or other related infrastructure.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\where.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('where.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('places.sqlite')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cookies.sqlite')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('formhistory.sqlite')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('logins.json')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('key4.db')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('key3.db')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sessionstore.jsonlz4')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('history')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('bookmarks')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cookies')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('login data'))))

output.summary: Adversaries may enumerate browser bookmarks to learn more about compromised hosts. Browser bookmarks may reveal personal information about users (ex: banking sites, interests, social media, etc.) as well as details about internal network resources such as servers, tools/dashboards, or other related infrastructure.
